name: Onslaught (itch) (autumnrealms-ia)
description: Our team of three beginner game developers made Onslaught for Brackey's Game Jam. We used a lot of mish-mashed coding to get to this point, but there was one important mechanic that we couldn't get to work. That being said, it's still pretty challenging, so we hope you enjoy it (especially the musical chaos).
